original_title: Close associate of ‘Welle Saranga’ shot dead
original_body_lines: Colombo, Feb 21 (Daily Mirror) - A man was killed after two unidentified men on a motorcycle opened fire at him in Mahabage this morning.
According to initial investigations, the victim has also been identified as a close associate of drug trafficker Saranga Pradeep alias 'Welle Saranga'.
